panels.title: Aptos Foundation Mainnet Fullnode Block Height vs Aptos Mainnet Fullnode Block Height
Aptos Foundation Testnet Fullnode Block Height vs Aptos Testnet Fullnode Block Height

targets.expr: (1 - (node_memory_MemAvailable_bytes{chain=~"$chain", network=~"$network", servicetype=~"$servicetype", job=~"$job"} / (node_memory_MemTotal_bytes{chain=~"$chain", network=~"$network", servicetype=~"$servicetype", job=~"$job"}))) * 100
